message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. 60-40 is a good starting point. Your turn!
I'll take a larger share, but still willing to compromise. Your turn!
That's still a bit too generous to Bob. I'd like to try to get a better split. Your turn!
I'm willing to give you a slightly smaller share, but I think this is a fairer split. Your turn!
I'm not budging, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. Your turn!
I'm not sure I'm comfortable with this offer, Bob. I was hoping for a bit more. Can you meet me at 500000 for me?
I'm not budging on this, Bob. 50-50 is the only way forward. Let's end this!
